summary: Defines an abstract StreamProcessor for handling the end‑to‑end flow of streaming data associated with a feature view, including reading from a stream source, applying transformations, and persisting results to an online feature store, and provides a factory function to obtain the appropriate processor implementation.
business_intent: Allow Feast users to plug in custom streaming logic so that real‑time features can be computed and ingested into the online store as part of a feature pipeline.
